mapper.select: SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE code=#{code} AND is_deleted='N';

SELECT a.code, a.series_code, a.user_code, a.title, a.content, a.confirm_content, a.thumbnail_image, a.views, a.price, a.is_paid, a.is_adult, a.is_public, a.is_deleted, a.create_date, a.update_date, b.title AS series_title FROM post a JOIN series b ON a.series_code=b.code WHERE a.code=#{code} AND a.is_deleted='N';

SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE series_code=#{code} AND is_deleted='N';
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET series_code=#{seriesCode}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, thumbnail_image=#{thumbnailImage}, price=#{price}, is_paid=#{isPaid}, is_adult=#{isAdult}, is_public=#{isPublic} WHERE code=#{code};
UPDATE post SET is_deleted = 'Y' WHERE code = #{code}
mapper.delete: UPDATE post SET is_deleted = 'N' WHERE series_code = #{code}
mapper.select: SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post AND is_deleted='N';

SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%') AND is_deleted='N';

SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE user_code=#{userCode} AND is_deleted='N';

SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE is_deleted='N' ORDER BY code DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET views = views + 1 WHERE code = #{code} AND is_deleted='N';
mapper.select: SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE is_deleted='N' AND user_code=#{code} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT p.code AS postCode, s.code AS seriesCode, p.user_code, p.price, p.is_paid, p.is_adult, p.is_public, s.is_membership_only FROM post p JOIN series s ON p.series_code = s.code WHERE p.code = ${ postCode }

SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE is_deleted='N' AND series_code = #{code} ORDER BY create_date LIMIT 1;
